short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a simple, but sufficient text editor to take notes! It is also pretty easy to use is very accessible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many features are present to make this extension worth while such as
- syncronised notes between any computers with browser's accounts
- quick notes
- download notes
- make private notes
- add to notes via context menu
- and more !

If you want to store some plain text data quickly, efficiently and with great accessibility, this extension is perfect for you!
